name: "Lovely" Spring Apron
description: Thinking of warmer weather & spring flowers?  Well I have just the apron for you. This lovely is made out of recycled floral linen and scraps of cotton fabric found about my house with a bit of lace at the bottom to finish things off. The pocket adorns a lovely crocheted applique. I also attached a loop for a kitchen towel..key's..garden tools..you name it. So grab yourself a glass of lemonade  & this lovely..then find a corner of your garden to relax.
